articles.content: The Super Bowl is this Sunday and, as with Thanksgiving or New Year's, the coronavirus doesn't care; it could infect you, or your friend, your mother or a stranger in the snack aisle, and never takes… [+4175 chars]

articles.title: Family of 4 says they contracted COVID-19 for 2nd time, symptoms worse - KWQC-TV6
articles.description: The family says the second infection was much worse, with symptoms that set on faster.
articles.content:
PAPILLION, Neb. (KETV) - A Nebraska family thought they were safe from COVID-19 after fighting it off, but months later, they were all facing the virus once again.
